name: Elements (OisintheGinger)
description:
Elements is a two player, platform climber game, in which the two characters are constantly drawn towards each other. The players must co-operate to escape the rising shadow and unite at the top of the tower.

(Disclaimer) 

This is a student project for Game Design Year 2 in DIT
